channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands Season 4: Stars and Shadows
channel.description:
![EUneWydXYAAM1ZS|623x500](upload://5hWnFdGWpTC4Lx1QT4IsXMJ4bt0.jpeg) Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. Old and new players are welcome. We will be using a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in June. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. [The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy ](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)will be in play. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit).
[date=2020-06-06 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-06-06 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M73ZQMObqsvnG2duB6h [date=2020-06-13 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-06-13 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M73ZuWNouBPqNrf9752 [date=2020-06-20 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-06-20 time=21:30:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M73ZuWNouBPqNrf9752

EUneWydXYAAM1ZS1280×1026 660 KB

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. Old and new players are welcome.
We will be using a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in June. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play. We will be using the X-Card.
